name: GunBit
description:
GunBit is a 12 minute run based game about an outlaw gun squashing a bunch of bugs while bouncing around in the air. It is recomended to play maximised and to have fun. 

[space] quickly restarts the game.

[Q] opens the menu (ending your current run).

----------------------------------------

Elemental effects:

Ignite - Makes enemies run in fear.

Freeze - Prevents enemies from moving.

Freeze and Ignite make bees unable to shoot stingers.

Igniting a frozen enemy removes the freeze effect.

Poison - deals damage over time.

Shock - deals damage to a random other enemy.

----------------------------------------

It is possible to play on a mobile device.
